Description:
916m2 Allotment, Residential Growth Zone Schedule 2
Attention all developers and investors, a myriad of opportunity awaits the astute purchaser of this property walking distance to Leopold Primary and Gateway Plaza! Subject to council approval, the owner has four concept plans prepared which show potential to either:
1. Keep the house and build 1 or 2 townhouses at the rear
2. Clear the site for townhouse development (2-4 townhouses)
The purpose of a residential growth zone, which this property is in, is to provide housing at increased densities. To encourage a diversity of housing types in locations offering good access to services and transport including activity centres and town centres. That's what makes this property real estate gold! Make no mistake, this property offers a solid home, a large 916m2 (approx.) allotment, excellent access to amenities and a prized Residential Growth Zone (Schedule 2)
Call now for further information!

Description:
AS NEW NO. 64 SPARKLES, ROOM FOR BOAT/CARAVAN AND 5.4 KW SOLAR SYSTEM !
This well maintained home is just perfect and so easy to look after with everything finished to make the living easy, many extras. Two living areas with the second open plan space opening to a large undercover paved room , the flow from in to out provides fabulous entertaining , winter and summer. Study nook, three generous bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry.
Features include leadlight , new manufactured timber floors, central heating, three split systems, Bosch 900m oven, Meile dishwasher, walk in pantry, double glazed front windows, quality window furnishings, roll down blinds, fans (2 external) and loads of storage.
The matured landscaped garden has automated watering system , great vegie patch to delight the cook. Double garage with internal access, (both doors have remotes), second driveway for the boat and or caravan or extra vehicles, shed and good fencing. This prime position is a short walk to the jetty, the dell, all amenities , schools, shops and leisure walks. Enjoy a swim at the bay , just at the end of the street or just sit and fish. Bellarine living sure takes the stress out of living!

Description:
Country Living in the Heart of Leopold
This exciting property delivers a relaxed rural atmosphere with the privilege of space, plus the convenience of urban living. Set on the fringe of dynamic Leopold within 15 minutes of the Bellarine beaches and Geelong CBD. This spacious and expansive 6 bedroom plus study home occupies approx. 3186 sqm with all of life amenities just around the corner.
Boasting farmhouse charm and touches of modern inspiration, the clever design offers generously proportioned rooms, including three separate living zones and a beautiful north-facing back deck. Warm timber paneling runs throughout and matches feature leadlight windows. A charming veranda runs the length of the façade and sets the mood of relaxation that is to come.
The huge family-friendly kitchen and living hub is the heart of the home. The kitchen features a step-in pantry, gas appliances and a dishwasher. The charming lounge, with bay window, buds off the living area, and a modern extension flows to the rear, providing seamless access to a huge family room. Soaring vaulting ceilings and wide banks of glazed windows are highlights in the family room. The family room extends through glass sliding doors to the deck creating a lovely indoor-outdoor flow. A Rinnai gas heater, split system and ceiling fans control the climate in the living zones.
The bedrooms are grouped in 2 separate wings, each wing has skylights which deliver bright natural light and a family bathroom. At the rear you will find 3 double bedrooms with built-in robes. Towards the front of the home, the master bedroom (with walk-in robe and ensuite) plus a further 2 bedrooms and the study. The laundry is family-sized with backyard access and there is great storage throughout.
The grounds offer an abundant of space and adjoining farmland at the rear boosts the private, rural feel. The deck flows to a patio and large lawn with cubby house. There are productive fruit trees, a garden shed and plenty of space for further self-sufficiency.
The attached carport houses at least 2 cars, with another 2 secure in the detached double garage. The 8x4m shed makes a perfect 'man cave' or workshop.
This property oozes potential! Seize this rare opportunity for sought-after urban-rural fusion!

Description:
Hidden Palace
Behind the front fence sits this magnificent, charming home, filled to the brim with unique character. It will consume you with vibrancy and all its outstanding features.
This home has an abundance of space with two large living areas, three bedrooms with built in robes, a bright central bathroom with a double vanity, shower and a large bath to relax in.
The front lounge room is very roomy and has natural sunlight streaming in and it really showcases this pristine home.
A fully functional kitchen with island beach top, a 900mm gas cook top and oven with a premium designed range hood and very decorative wall tiles, transforms to contemporary splendour.
The hub of the home is the fantastic designed kitchen, dining and living room with its immaculate timber feature wall, timber-laminate flooring and decorative finishes.
An added bliss, with an additional room with comfort and style. An outdoor yet enclosed living room with exceptional finishes to entertain your guests or just chill out will be sure to impress. To cap this room off is a magnificent free standing chiminea, to enjoy the added warmth when required.
Additional space for storage or the gardening equipment is in abundance outside.
This home and its proximity to Drysdale and Clifton Springs, where shopping is plentiful with Aldi, Coles and Woolworths supermarkets and sporting clubs creates ease of living. Come and enjoy the peaceful ambience of living and playing on the Bellarine.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Lovingly Renovated Classic Brick Unit
The Feel:
This classic brick unit has been lovingly renovated, bringing it into modernity with contemporary features for todays lifestyle requirements. Behind the original façade, well thought out updates extend through the kitchen, bathroom and beyond. The stunning gardens provide incredible privacy and offer stunning greenery outlooks from every room and screen the outdoor entertaining spaces. Whether for a down-sizer or young family, this central unit will provide an incredibly convenient lifestyle nearby to all of Leopolds best amenities.
The Facts:
-Fully refurbished throughout including modern bathroom and large kitchen
-5Kw Solar panel system means little or no electricity bills!
-Quality unit with established gardens & alfresco entertaining space
-Practical floorplan with spacious lounge adjoining sunlit dining area
-Updated carpet, tiles, lighting, blinds and ducted heating throughout
-Parking for up to 3 vehicles with 2 separate garage/ workshops plus parking space
-Large kitchen offers SS 900mm oven with gas cooktop and drawer dishwasher
-Modern central bathroom offers large vanity with bath and separate shower
-Cosy formal lounge with in-built speakers, cooling and also has access to alfresco space
-3 bedrooms all offer BIRs with 3rd BR doubling as second living zone if required
-Situated at the rear of the complex increasing privacy and reducing any road noise
-Fantastic location; close to all facilities & easy access to the best of the Bellarine
The Owner Loves
The gardens that surround the entire home give us beautiful outlooks from every window and complete privacy. The location is also fantastic with everything just down the road.

Description:
Double your returns
Stunning opportunity for investors looking for dual income stream. With a highly respected local business as anchor tenant of the commercial section of the two storey building this is a sound offering.
The second level residence is currently used for short term stays but would easily convert to a permanent rental for an outstanding return.
The ground floor commercial space has full street frontage, kitchenette & toilet facilities. Inspection of the commercial shop is strictly by appointment as it is a very busy hairdressing salon.
The upstairs residence is well designed to take advantage of the view towards the bay & the You Yangs with dual sliding door access onto the alfresco deck with quality shade blind.
The mains gas stainless steel fireplace is a dramatic feature of the living room & cleverly doubles as the entertainment wall.
The modern kitchen with island bench, entertaining servery, 900mm stainless oven & gas cooktop, plenty of draws & overhead cupboards.
Master bedroom with walk around robe & direct bathroom access.
Bedrooms two & three a fully carpeted with built in robes.
Industrial style stainless tap & ceramic bathroom fittings give it that inner city warehouse chic feeling. A large bath & an oversize double shower complete the package.
The high vaulted ceilings with skylights let in plenty of light.
Striking timber floors are stunning feature throughout.
Entry via remote through the four car garage to the residence from the rear laneway.
There is a downstairs laundry & Shower with access via the spiral staircase to the second level.
Please enquire for further details on income returns & section 32.

Description:
CHARACTER CHARM
There is a uniqueness and charm that characterizes 4 Thamballina Road Clifton Springs. The features of this beautiful home include a Dutch hip roof line, solid timber features and cathedral ceilings. Built in the mid 90s by the current vendors. The home was extended in 2008 expanding on the living, kitchen and bedroom space. All included there are five bedrooms, four living areas and two bathrooms.
Parents can enjoy their own space with the main bedroom, ensuite, WIR and private retreat all located upstairs. The minor downstairs bedrooms are serviced by a quality renovated bathroom.
As you enter the living area stunning timber beams compliment the cathedral ceilings, stained glass window and feature solid fuel heater. The open plan living, dining, kitchen areas incorporate access to the serene, outdoor deck with established shrubbery. A renovated kitchen has granite bench tops, quality appliances & cabinetry.
The extension incorporates a two further bedrooms with WIRs, second living area with gas log fire for those cool nights and kitchen facilitites. Up the spiral staircase there is a quiet space with its own balcony which has a water views of Corio Bay. Complete with attic storage.
Manicured gardens make outdoor time a pleasure. Addition of two water tanks provides for the vegetable garden beds.
The double garage with remote provides plenty of room for parking.

Description:
ONE OWNER, CUSTOM DESIGN /BUILD, BAY VIEWS, SOLAR PANELS.
No. 35 has been designed to suit the block and take advantage of the bay views and magnificent sunsets from inside or relaxing on the wrap round verandah. A large living and dining room combine with the adjacent kitchen, three bedrooms, master with ensuite, with all bedrooms having BIR'S, attic study with views, central bathroom and laundry . Features include split system, gas log fire, fans, Belling oven, some dble. glazed windows and more to inspect. Matured fruit trees, fernery, water tanks, workshop and plenty of access for extra cars, caravan and more storage. Built with a conscious effort to create harmony with the environment where you can just walk to the end of the street to the bay, convenience shops and golf club. This home is affordable, needs some easy maintenance , mainly paintwork and roll up your sleeves in the garden. Wow! 662 SQM approx., on the Bellarine Peninsula, just call me for an appointment now.

Description:
Family Living That Feels Like A Holiday
The Feel:
Boasting bay views & close proximity to village shops, parks & schools, this tri-level family home is located in a prestigious locale. This property comprises 4 bedrooms, including a king-size master with private balcony & Bay views, WIR & en-suite. A second master with wet area offers versatility for guest accommodation or growing children, while upstairs presents 2 additional bedrooms, or a flexible home office. Ducted heating/cooling throughout & a gas log fire in the main living area provide year-round comfort, while the well-equipped kitchen & meals open to a covered deck & protected cottage garden. Space & style is yours on Panoramic Terrace.
The Facts:
-Custom 3-storey property with zoned floorplan for entertaining & family life
-Generous lounge room with stunning views & cosy gas log fire
-Covered north-facing balcony is the perfect place to watch great sunsets over the Bay
-Spacious, light-filled living areas to the front & rear, with outstanding design features
-High ceilings, tiled entry & New English Oak timber floors/stairs extend the sense of spaciousness
-Superb fixtures, double glazed windows & quality carpet flooring throughout
-Well-equipped kitchen with central island bench & ample storage
-Whirlpool dual electric ovens, 5 burner gas hob & Electrolux dishwasher
-Seamless connection to rear covered deck with café blinds for entertaining & relaxing
-Low maintenance cottage garden with flowering gum, lemon & olive trees
-Elevated Master captures panoramic views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Second master with en-suite offers versatility for guest accommodation or growing children
-Upstairs presents 2 more bedrooms, or option to utilise one as a dedicated home office
-Family bathroom with spa bath, large shower & separate WC
-Ducted Inverter heating & cooling ensures total comfort
-RC DLUG with exposed aggregate concrete driveway & convenient internal access
-Impressive features incl: double glazing, 3kw solar, 2 tanks, workshop & ample phone/tv points
-Kiln-dried hardwood battens to north-facing balcony exterior wall
-Set within a short walk of family amenities, shopping & a choice of schools
-Peaceful, quiet neighbourhood with parkland close by
The Owner Loves.
Our family loves the open plan kitchen/dining & the main living area that brings everyone together, yet with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy quiet time & study. Our days begin with coffee on the balcony & conclude with a glass of wine overlooking the Bay & You Yangs.

Description:
Simply The Best!
Without a doubt this executive style residence announces itself as one of the finest in the local property market! The modern contemporary design is complemented by a wonderfully warm 'welcome home' feel. An inclusions list of the highest calibre creates a 'must see' for prospective purchases who demand uncompromising excellence. The complete article & a genuine 'turn key' prospect this could be the ultimate seachange lifestyle you have been searching for!
3 beautifully appointed bedrooms; the luxurious master suite is complete with an impressive ensuite & walk in robe. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are oversized and also offer walk in robes. A study provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan.
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/dining; dual glass sliding doors promote an abundance of natural light & creates a seamless connection to an expansive hardwood deck sure to be a highlight for those who love to entertain.
The kitchen is 'top shelf' in every sense; sleek contemporary straight lines work effortlessly with earthy textures and tones. Expansive dual stone bench tops, butler's pantry, custom cabinetry, feature pendant lighting, Veneto 900mm stainless steel gas cook top & Fisher & Paykel Double DishDrawer.
A 2nd independent living area showcases wonder scale; a feature floor to ceiling window takes full advantage of the northerly aspect & frames the beautiful landscaped garden setting the flowering natives often attract the local birdlife.
A home of this calibre boasts an impressive inclusions list; Bonaire Navigator 3 zoned gas ducted heating, dual split system heating/cooling, custom window furnishings, European appliances, landscaped gardens (with a low maintenance profile), exposed aggregate driveway, hardwood decking, oversized double remote controlled garage & an impressive 5.75kw solar power system ensures this property is winning the efficiency stakes. Many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection.
The A+ location simply cannot be overstated; set within a boutique pocket of Clifton Springs flanked by quality homes. A central orientation has you perfectly placed to take full advantage of Drysdale's fully equipped amenities (retail & health services). The tranquil setting of McLeods Waterholes Reserve is only a short stroll away with easy access to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp & the rolling green fairways of the Clifton Springs Golf Club.

Description:
Feature-packed family home.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Set on a generous 766m2 allotment, this fantastic property is sure to appeal to those searching for space, privacy, and a family-friendly location.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a study or 4th bedroom, 3 living zones and a stunning backyard with large shed, this property would be ideal for a young family, or tradespeople that require the extra secure storage.
On Entry, the wide hallway and light-filled front living area welcomes you and leads through to the open-plan kitchen living and dining area. To the rear of the home, a large rumpus room adds to the already spacious interior of the home.
The kitchen boasts a 900mm gas cooktop, electric oven, and single drawer dishwasher with a large window overlooking the side yard.
Accommodation is comprised of a large main bedroom with ensuite, walk-in robe, ceiling fan, and beautiful bay window. Two more bedrooms down the hall both offer built-in robes and ceilings fans and are serviced by a convenient central bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside you will find a sunny outdoor entertaining area with built-in sandpit, shade sail, and a large grassed area with secure fencing. Perfect for those with young kids or pets. The fantastic 7x6m shed offers a concrete slab, double roller door, and is accessible through the rear roller door of the garage. The garage is currently set up as a single garage with a dividing wall that houses a craft/sealed storage room. This room could easily be removed and converted back to a double garage.
Notable Features Include:
- Gas Central Heating
- In-ceiling speakers in all living areas
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and study
The family-friendly location of this property is sure to tick all of your boxes, with the local park at the end of the court, the Bellarine Rail Trail just a short stroll away and all of your daily amenities all within a 5-minute drive including Leopold's Gateway plaza, local community supermarkets, public transport and school bus routes all at arm's reach.

Description:
Pure Potential
** Please note best access to the property is via Moonaree Road **
This conveniently located property boasts a substantial 853m² (approx) allotment plus a solid low maintenance home and is a potential packed opportunity. The brick and tile residence enjoys easy access from a quiet court at the rear and features multiple living zones. Choose from a formal front lounge with ornate ceilings and a feature stone hearth; an open plan area with dining and kitchen; or a large rumpus room at the rear. The generous kitchen has been recently updated and includes 900mm gas cooking, extensive work and storage space and a contemporary finish. Enjoy cosy evenings in front of the log fire in winter, while ducted heating and cooling keep things comfortable too.
There are three bedrooms, (two with built in robes), a family bathroom plus a laundry with a second powder room. Other features include plentiful storage, a sunny northerly aspect and solid timber floors.
Outdoors the site is fully fenced and private with established trees and gardens. A large sheltered deck provides the perfect spot for entertaining and a lock up garage; rainwater storage tank and ample off street parking are also included.
This handy location is right on the doorstep of all the essential amenities, with primary school, public transport, Leopold Memorial Reserve and shopping at the Gateway Plaza just moments away. This is the ideal position to enjoy effortless access to Bellarine beaches, wineries and eateries with Geelong only 15 minutes away too. Investors, developers and first home buyers take note, there are exciting possibilities to be explored here.

Description:
The Four Seasons!
Positioned within a tranquil green leafy setting this charming residence complete with all the modern comforts delivers a truly idyllic 'four seasons' lifestyle home.
-The spring bloom; a dazzling colour pallet of flowering natives and blossoms
-Balmy summer nights capturing cool summer breezes
-The ever changing landscape of a classic autumn
-Rolling green pastures of the neighbouring parklands over the winter months
Charming 3 bedroom residence boasts a warm and welcoming feel; flanked by the Bullimah Reserve on both the rear and side boundaries creates a peaceful haven.
The open plan living area boasts a wonderful northerly aspect and is light filled
A modernised galley style kitchen features stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry and expansive benchtops
A glass sliding door from the primary living zone creates a seamless connection to a beautifully appointed enclosed alfresco lovely space to take in an early coffee or an evening glass of wine from one of the Bellarine's award wining wineries.
Courtesy of the prime landing of approximately 588m2 this property boasts lovely established gardens and an enviable openness.
A generous (7.8m x 3.7m approx) remote controlled roller door carport is complemented by an equally generous (6.2m x 3.7m approx) shed; providing room enough for the car, boat and even the jet ski.
All the modern comforts and lifestyle features one could wish for the ultimate 'sea change' property prospect.
The A+ location of this property cannot be understated; close proximity to the water's edge, neighbouring parklands, the Clifton Springs Golf Course only a short stroll away and the highly regarded Clifton Springs Boat Ramp is literally just down the road. The Bellarine Peninsula offers a wonderful 'seaside lifestyle; a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, award winning wineries and so much more!

Description:
Calling All Families, Tradies & Hobby Farmers!
Occupying approx. 1.4 acres, this property presents a terrific opportunity for families, tradies, and hobby farmers alike! The large shed accommodates four vehicles, while a paddock and animal pen are located at the rear of the property!
Both Moolap Primary School and Moolap Reserve are within walking distance, while easy access to public transport and the Bellarine Highway shops is a huge plus. Situated on the border of Moolap industrial zone, this property also offers immense value for commercial businesses searching for extra space.
With all of the living zones overlooking the sheltered alfresco and side yard, parents will love that they can keep an eye on little ones as they play outside. A wall-to-wall bookcase makes a stylish statement in the front lounge, which is awash in natural light. The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and appliances (F&P dishwasher, St.George wall oven and 900mm electric cooktop). The dining area opens onto the sheltered alfresco for casual indoor-outdoor living. Graced with a wood heater, the spacious living room unites with both the sheltered alfresco and rear sun-drenched deck providing effortless entertaining options!
Zoned to the rear of the home for privacy, the generous Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling keep you in the utmost comfort. The remote double lock-up garage features a built-in office.
With the expansive backyard wrapping around the entire home, a wonderland is created for the whole family to enjoy. Nestled under the trees, the fire pit provides the perfect setting for a cold winter night. Parents will appreciate that the yard can be sectioned off from the rear paddocks to create a secure space for children and pets. The separate games room and rumpus room, complete with a wood heater, put the foundations in place for lively gatherings. Complete with a built-in workbench, the shed accommodates four vehicles plus plenty of room for a workshop. The rear paddock and animal pen will delight hobby farmers.
With so much to offer, youll need to act swiftly to secure this property! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Panoramic views of the Bay
Overlooking Corio Bay, offering panoramic views of the lights of Geelong to the You Yangs is this beautifully presented family home on approx. 802 sqm.
Raised on concrete stumps with a lovely westerly facing verandah that wraps around to a private undercover entertaining deck. The easterly side is level with the ground & offers an easy access to the generous backyard.
Located in the much sought after Waterford Place this family home is amongst some of the most prestigious properties in Clifton Springs.
You'll love entertaining in the separate formal lounge with an outstanding outlook.
The large open plan kitchen, dining & casual living room is designed to take advantage of the views.
Warmed in winter by a feature gas log fire & cooled in summer by the split system air conditioner.
A king size bedroom big enough to easily fit a dressing chair.
The third bedroom will delight guests upon waking up with exceptional bay views to the lights of Geelong.
Offering wide side access for a caravan and/or boat without losing your view.
Double garage with drive through access for secure backyard storage.
Just wait til you see the sunset...
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Custom 90s home in a serene pocket.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Occupying 988m2 of elevated land, this unique and imposing home has been cleverly designed to capture natural light from every angle and is sure to tick the boxes for those searching for space, privacy and something a little bit special.
Grand feature ceilings and seamless floor to ceiling windows capture stunning views over the region and the UV blocking tint provides both privacy and year-round energy efficiency.
On entry, the beautiful formal living and dining area is light-filled and spacious and leads through to the large, open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The unique kitchen offers plentiful storage and an conservatory-style ceiling that captures the warming morning sun and overlooks the tranquil backyard greenery.
Accommodation is well-appointed and offers a large master bedroom with a walk-in robe and ensuite with spa-bath and light-catching glass bricks. Two further bedrooms both offer large built-in robes and are conveniently serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet. A potential forth bedroom or study is located adjacent to the master, and could be a perfect nursery.
Outside, the stunning backyard offers year-round greenery and privacy, with plenty of space for the kids and pets to run around, the possibility of a pool (STCA), and of course, entertaining family and friends in the Boston Ivy-draped trellis-style alfresco.
Notable features include:
- Split system air-conditioning in living and main bedroom.
- Ducted gas heating throughout.
- Huge double garage with adjoining workshop / third car space.
- Off-street parking for a further 5 cars in the driveway.
- New paint throughout.
- New carpet throughout.
- New Blinds throughout.
Located within 5 minutes of Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, outdoor living, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.

Description:
Low-Maintenance Living Has Never Looked So Good.
Have you been dreaming of low-maintenance living but don't want to compromise on space or quality? Then this is the one for you. Whether you're a first homebuyer, downsizer, or investor, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this Leopold gem.
Positioned in a peaceful pocket, you can enjoy a quiet lifestyle while still being close to everyday essentials. Public transport and the Ash Road shops are a short stroll away, while the expansive Gateway Plaza is close by for all of your shopping and dining needs. Young families will appreciate that Leopold Kindergarten, Leopold P.S. and the Leopold Community Hub are all within walking distance. Easy access to sporting grounds and the Gateway Sanctuary inspires you to venture outdoors. Just jump in the car, and you'll soon be in the heart of Geelong or exploring the Bellarine Peninsula.
High, square set ceilings and polished floorboards grace the immaculate interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the north-facing alfresco deck - creating a generous setting for both everyday living and for when loved ones come to visit. Whether you want to relax under the shade sail or soak up the sunshine, the private deck will effortlessly accommodate. The kitchen will delight cooking enthusiasts with a built-in pantry, breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom features built-in robes and an en suite with large shower. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. The generous study boasts a built-in desk and storage perfect for students and home business owners alike! The laundry is complete with storage and external access.
You'll be comfortable all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans. Updates over the last two years include freshly painted interiors, new carpet, new remote garage door, new hot water service and a new oven and gas cooktop. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a 2100L rainwater tank adds the final touch to this low-maintenance gem.

Set in an elevated position, on a generous 709m2 block, this beautiful family home is sure to impress those searching for space, convenience and privacy.
Offering 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and plentiful indoor and outdoor living space, as well as an expansive backyard, this property is ideal for the growing family.
On entry, the large living area welcomes you and flows through to the open plan kitchen, and dining area. The kitchen/dining room blends seamlessly with the decked alfresco, which offers views over Corio Bay and is ideal for year-round entertainment with the whole family.
The kitchen with step-in-pantry & stainless-steel appliances offers plentiful cupboard space. The main bedroom offers an ensuite and a walk in robe with built in cabinetry. Bedrooms 2 and 3 both offer built in robes and the 4th bedroom could be ideal for a home study if desired.
Notable features include:
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
- Oversized single garage/workshop in backyard
- Gas heater and wall A/C in the kitchen/dining room
- Split system A/C in the living room
Located in a well-established area surrounded by quiet tree-lined streets, parks, gardens, recreation reserve, bike tracks and running trails. Conveniently located close to public transport, local schools, and is just a short drive to Leopold's Gateway Shopping Centre. Call to arrange your private inspection!

Description:
Live the Country and Coast Lifestyle
The Feel:
Set on 2.5 acres (approx) this stunning residence has an vast array of features from the luxe kitchen, formal living rooms and incredible gardens. This home will appeal to many. Situated to enjoy the best of beach and bush, Ocean Groves surf and amenities are minutes away, and the local primary school is just around the corner. Ideal for families seeking the enormous benefits of life on acreage, this extensive property provides so much.
The Facts:
-Contemporary 3BR plus study home on 2.5 (approx). picturesque acres
-Tree lined driveway leads to home, set back from the road, with 100% privacy
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Rhinds Rd, Wallington
-Living zones maximise the sunny North & West aspects, with a private, protected entertaining area
-Large kitchen positioned in the heart of the home, under high ceilings w/ stone island benchtop
-Smeg oven, Electrolux induction cooktop, Asko dishwasher & large Walk in Pantry
-2nd living offers formal lounge & dining room with garden views, large hearth & open fire place
-Bedrooms have fully fitted BIRs & enjoy garden views
-Master bedroom with ensuite with large shower & toilet
-Separate bedroom wing with bathroom, separate toilet & spa bath
-Stunning european Oak parquetry flooring
-Seasonal comfort with open fireplace, SSAC as well as ceiling fans
-Mature Orchard (40 trees) producing a range of fruit incl Apple, Pear, Nectarine, Peach and Cherry etc
-Mature Citrus incl Lime & Lemon
-DLUG with solid concrete flooring & internal door access to large workshop, ensuite, kitchen and 2 more separate store rooms
-13,500L Rainwater tank for garden & drinking, plus town water supply
-Only 5mins to Gateway Plaza SC, less than 10mins to Ocean Grove shops, cafes & beach
The Owner Loves.
I love the family/kitchen room, with the garden views through every window, it is such a very peaceful and comfortable home to be inside
